title: Automating Attendance with Face Recognition: A Final-Year Project Journey
description: A deep dive into building a real-time attendance system using face recognition and machine learning.

content.text: Remember the old-school roll calls in classrooms? Tedious, time-consuming, and prone to errors. What if we could automate this process using technology that recognizes faces and marks attendance in real-time?

That's exactly what we set out to do in our final-year engineering project: an automated attendance system powered by face recognition and machine learning. This blog post walks you through our journey—from concept to implementation—highlighting the tech stack, challenges, and results.

This project was more than just a technical challenge—it was a glimpse into how AI can simplify everyday tasks. By combining machine learning with embedded systems, we created a solution that's not only functional but also impactful.
